definitions.definition: a rope attached to the lower part of a sail
a rope attached to a yard that sailors stood on to stabilize it when furling or reefing
a rope or chain forming the bottom edge of a trawl net, helping to maintain the net's shape and depth in the water.

main_definition: ( nautical ) a rope attached to the lower part of a sail
secondary_definitions: ( nautical ) a rope attached to a yard that sailors stood on to stabilize it when furling or reefing
a rope or chain forming the bottom edge of a trawl net, helping to maintain the net's shape and depth in the water.
